Package play.mvc

Class Http.Flash

  • Object
    • play.mvc.Http.Flash
  • Enclosing class:
    Http
    public static class Http.Flash
extends Object
    HTTP Flash.

    Flash data are encoded into an HTTP cookie, and can only contain simple String values.
